alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion; Vernon; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 07 at 2:27PM CDT until October 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning for Central and Southwestern Louisiana this afternoon and early evening... ...Red Flag Warning for Central and Southwestern Louisiana Sunday afternoon and early evening... Gusty winds and relative humidity values around 40% or less will continue through the remainder of the afternoon in the wake of a potent cold front, with conditions improving around sunset. Tomorrow, winds will be much lighter than today however, very low dewpoints along with afternoon RH values in the 20 to 30 percent range will result in critical fire weather conditions once again. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Lower Vermilion, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary. * TIMING...From 11 AM to 7 PM today and again from 11 AM to 7 PM Sunday. * WINDS...North 10 to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Low to mid 70s both today and Sunday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended and or prohibited in some areas. Please check burn ban laws in your County or Parish.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
